Package BE

Class CampFileHandler

java.lang.Object
BE.CampFileHandler
public class CampFileHandler extends Object
CampFileHandler class handles file operations for camps and user data.

    • saveCampsToTextFile_2

      public static void saveCampsToTextFile_2(ArrayList<Camp> camps, String filePath)
      Saves camp data to a text file with detailed information.
      Parameters:
      camps - List of camps to be saved.
      filePath - Path to the file where the camp data will be saved.

    • loadCampsFromFile

      public static ArrayList<Camp> loadCampsFromFile(String filePath, ArrayList<User> usersData, String CampsFilePathWithMembers) throws FileNotFoundException
      Loads camp data from a text file, populating camp information including attendees, committee members, and withdrawn attendees.
      Parameters:
      filePath - Path to the file containing camp data.
      usersData - List of all users' data including students and staff.
      CampsFilePathWithMembers - Path to the file that contains camp information with member details.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of camps loaded from the file.
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - If the file to be loaded is not found.

    • extractStudentID

      public static String extractStudentID(String input)
      Extracts the Student ID from a string input.
      Parameters:
      input - The input string containing Student ID information.
      Returns:
      The extracted Student ID.

    • getObj

      public static User getObj(ArrayList<User> usersData, String name)
      Searches for a User object by name within an ArrayList of Users.
      Parameters:
      usersData - The ArrayList of User objects to search within.
      name - The name to search for.
      Returns:
      The User object if found, otherwise returns null.
